title: Bronze problems
body: Am I right? and am I the only one or is there many others out there with the same problem?

replies.body:
Na, not for me. The most I've been in one division is thrice for Bronze 3 (gone up to b2, then down to b3, repeated thrice).
I guess it does help when you don't play much ranked, though :)
well I hope you don't have to keep repeating it. My advice is if someone is trolling just mute them and get the job done, it usually works but not when your team fights with this one troll.
